detail_desc: Short dress in airy, crinkled, patterned chiffon with a frill-trimmed V-neck with ties at the front and small frilled collar at the top. Frill trims over the shoulders and at the cuffs. Partly lined in jersey.
Swim shorts in a patterned weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and short legs with slits in the sides. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Fully lined swimsuit with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, high-cut legs and medium coverage at the back.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a text print on the front, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Metal earrings in various designs and sizes. Size 0.3-3.5 cm.

Short, sleeveless dress in a patterned weave with a V-neck front and back and a sewn-in wrapover with a concealed press-stud at the front. Two flounces around the neckline, and horizontal ties across the back of the neck. Elasticated seam at the waist and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Lined.
Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front, chest pocket and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit with beaded appliqués at the top, a turtle neck and low dropped shoulders.
Fancy dress wig made from coloured synthetic hair. Mesh lining with an elasticated edge.
Short-sleeved polo shirts in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar (one patterned), a button placket and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Cropped top in jersey with lacing at the front, dropped shoulders, short sleeves and a raw, roll-edge hem.
Short, V-neck lace dress with an opening and button at the back of the neck and 3/4-length sleeves. Gathers in the side seams for best fit over the tummy. Jersey lining.
Long-sleeved cardigan in soft, textured-knit cotton with a round neckline, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Calf-length, bell-shaped skirt in a fine-knit viscose blend with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with roll-edge ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, off-the-shoulder, straight-cut dress in lace with elastication and a wide flounce at the top. Lined.
Short blouse in a crêpe weave with a V-neck with buttons and a knot detail at the front. Long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs and smocking at the back of the hem.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Leggings containing glittery threads with an elasticated waist.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a regular waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Boxy-style jumper in a fine knit with a soft, brushed finish. Low dropped shoulders and long dolman sleeves.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a wrapover, ribbed V-neck and dropped shoulders. Long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs, and a ribbed hem with slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Round-necked jersey T-shirt in a cotton blend.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket and jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front and decorative drawstring. Long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with embroidery, a drawstring hood, dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric. Hood with a wrapover front, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and a straight, cut-off, raw-edge hem.
Strapless balconette bra in lace with underwired, lightly padded cups that lift and shape the bust. Support panels and elastic straps at the sides, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Hats in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Long jacket in a soft weave with notch lapels, flap welt front pockets, a gently tapered waist and long sleeves. No fasteners. Lined.
Sleeveless top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Metal rings in various designs.

Ankle-length trousers in an airy linen and viscose weave. High waist with elastication at the back, pleats at the top and a tie belt. Zip fly and buttons, side pockets and straight-cut legs that taper to the hem with creases.

Straight-cut, calf-length dress in woven fabric with a grandad collar and covered buttons at the top. Detachable tie belt at the waist and long, slightly wider sleeves with covered buttons at the narrow cuffs. Unlined.
Fitted body in soft jersey with a V-neck, long sleeves and lined gusset with concealed press-studs.
Cap in woven fabric with a motif and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Short, fitted dress in soft viscose jersey with a decorative knot detail at the front and long sleeves.
Fine-knit socks in soft chenille yarn with elasticated tops.
Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey.
Sports joggers in jersey made from a cotton blend with taped details. Elasticated waist, a slightly lower crotch with a ventilating mesh section, and zipped side pockets.
Hooded jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Top in soft, patterned organic cotton jersey with short, tassel-trimmed, double-flounced sleeves (sizes 2-4Y with fringing).
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a reflective print on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Neat sports bag in a quilted weave with two handles that can be hung over the shoulder. Elasticated drawstring at the top and an open inner compartment. Lined in taffeta made from recycled polyester. Depth 6 cm. Width 40 cm. Height 45 cm.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short shorts in a soft, patterned weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Short jumper in an airy rib knit with a boat neck, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with embroidered details. Narrow elastication and a small frill at the cuffs and hem.

Jacket in washed, printed denim with sparkly stones, a collar, and buttons down the front and at the cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button, welt front pockets and an adjustable tab and buttons at the sides.

Long tulle dress with a wrapover bodice and shoulder straps with decorative knots at the ends. Concealed zip and an opening with covered buttons at the back, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt with an extra layer of tulle for added width. Satin lining.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight, printed cotton sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and a tie detail at the hem.
Short-sleeved top in jersey crêpe with inset lace trims, a round neckline and a small opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck.
Trousers in a patterned crêpe weave with elastication at the back of the waistband, a fake fly, side pockets and straight, ankle-length legs.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey. The cotton content of the tops is organic.
Wide hairband in cotton jersey with a twisted detail.
Body in soft jersey with a sheen under a layer of sequined mesh. Adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps and a lined gusset with press studs.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Short dress in an airy weave with long raglan sleeves and a decorative drawstring and opening at the top. Elasticated seam at the waist and flounces at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Joggers in lightweight jersey made from a cotton blend with a ribbed, elasticated waistband, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems. The cotton content of the joggers is organic.

Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch cotton blend with a zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and a regular waist with concealed elastication. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a high, elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Off-the-shoulder top in soft jersey with smocking that wraps over at the front and extends over at the arms. Loose-fitting style that drapes lightly.
Fine-knit polo shirt in a silk and cotton blend with a button placket and ribbing at the collar, cuffs and hem.
Scarf in soft, rib-knit cashmere. Size 35x170 cm.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Suit trousers in woven fabric with concealed, adjustable elastication at the waist and an extended waistband with a hook-and-eye fastening. Zip fly, side pockets, fake jetted pockets with a button at the back, and straight legs with creases down the front.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in woven fabric with elastication around the top and short sleeves.
Yoga tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing to hold in and shape the waist. Mesh key pocket in the waistband.
Flared, pleated, knee-length skirt in a rib knit with a sheen. High, elasticated waist.
Suede platform shoes with toe caps, lacing at the top with wide, frayed laces. Twill linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Platform front 5 cm, back 7.5 cm.
Trousers in airy viscose with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and slightly wider, tapered legs with elasticated hems.
V-neck T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Fancy dress costume in soft velour with long sleeves and long legs. Hood with embroidery and appliqués, a zip down the front with a chin guard and narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hems.

Checked shirt in soft cotton twill with a collar, buttons down the front and a text print on the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, one with embroidered text, and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Rounded hem, slightly longer at the back.
Metal hair clips covered in shimmering, pastel-coloured beads in plastic.
Short shorts in soft jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Short-sleeved dress in patterned cotton jersey with a seam at the hips and a gathered skirt.
Off-the-shoulder playsuit in an airy, patterned weave with a flounce at the top, an elasticated seam at the waist and short legs. Lined.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with an unlined hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
